languages.text: "Однако... Меня беспокоит {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaAmuletOn}камень{/d}, что вы вживили в меня по научению Фелека. Я не могу от него избавиться, вырвать, вырезать... Даже прикоснуться к нему не могу. Он душит меня, тяготит так, словно сердце сковал сизый лед. Надеюсь лишь, что он не помешает мне править корабль сквозь {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Море Душ{/g}".

traits.locale_text: "Однако... Меня беспокоит амулет, что вы на меня надели по научению Фелека. Я так и не могу его снять. Он душит меня, тяготит так, словно сердце сковал сизый лед. Надеюсь лишь, что он не помешает мне править корабль сквозь {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Море Душ{/g}".

languages.text: "However... I am troubled by that {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaAmuletOn}stone{/d} you implanted inside me according to Felek's instructions. I cannot remove it, or tear it out, or cut it out... I cannot even touch it. It is suffocating me, weighing me down as though my heart were locked in grey-blue ice. I can but hope that it will not be a hindrance when I am guiding the ship through the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Sea of Souls{/g}."
languages.original_text: "Однако... Меня беспокоит {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaAmuletOn}камень{/d}, что вы вживили в меня по научению Фелека. Я не могу от него избавиться, вырвать, вырезать... Даже прикоснуться к нему не могу. Он душит меня, тяготит так, словно сердце сковал сизый лед. Надеюсь лишь, что он не помешает мне править корабль сквозь {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Море Душ{/g}".

traits.locale_text: "However... I am troubled by that stone you put on me according to Felek's instructions. I cannot remove it, no matter how I try. It is suffocating me, weighing me down as though my heart were locked in grey-blue ice. I can but hope that it will not be a hindrance when I am guiding the ship through the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Sea of Souls{/g}."

"However... I am troubled by that stone you put on me according to Felek's instructions. I cannot remove it, no matter how I try. It is suffocating me, weighing me down as though my heart were locked in grey-blue ice. I can but hope that it will not be a hindrance when I am guiding the ship through the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Sea of Souls{/g}."

"However... I am troubled by that stone you put on me according to Felek's instructions. I cannot remove it, no matter how I try. It is suffocating me, weighing me down as though my heart were locked in grey-blue ice. I can but hope that it will not be a hindrance when I am guiding the ship through the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Sea of Souls{/g}."

"However... I am troubled by that stone you implanted inside me according to Felek's instructions. I cannot remove it, or tear it out, or cut it out... I cannot even touch it. It is suffocating me, weighing me down as though my heart were locked in grey-blue ice. I can but hope that it will not be a hindrance when I am guiding the ship through the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Sea of Souls{/g}."

languages.text: “不过……你按照费雷克的指示，将一块{d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaAmuletOn}石头{/d}放在了我体内。那块石头让我感到很困扰，无论我怎么努力想把它弄掉，就算是想把它扯出来或挖出来，也都无济于事。它让我感到窒息，仿佛将我沉重的心锁在了灰蓝色的坚冰中。我只能希望，当我引导这艘船通过{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}灵魂之海{/g}时，它不会成为我的阻碍。”
languages.original_text: "However... I am troubled by that {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaAmuletOn}stone{/d} you implanted inside me according to Felek's instructions. I cannot remove it, or tear it out, or cut it out... I cannot even touch it. It is suffocating me, weighing me down as though my heart were locked in grey-blue ice. I can but hope that it will not be a hindrance when I am guiding the ship through the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Sea of Souls{/g}."

traits.locale_text: “不过……你按照费雷克的指示，在我身上放了一块石头，那块石头让我感到很困扰。无论我怎么努力，都无法将它移走。它让我感到窒息，仿佛将我沉重的心锁在了灰蓝色的坚冰中。我只能希望，当我引导这艘船通过{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}灵魂之海{/g}时，它不会成为我的阻碍。”

languages.text: "Allerdings ... Beunruhigt mich der {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaAmuletOn}Stein{/d}, den Ihr mir nach Feleks Anweisungen implantiert habt. Ich kann ihn weder entfernen, noch herausreißen oder herausschneiden ... Ich kann ihn nicht einmal berühren. Er erstickt und belastet mich, als wäre mein Herz in graublauem Eis eingeschlossen. Ich kann nur hoffen, dass er mich nicht behindert, wenn ich das Schiff durch das {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Meer der Seelen{/g} steuere."
languages.original_text: "However... I am troubled by that {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaAmuletOn}stone{/d} you implanted inside me according to Felek's instructions. I cannot remove it, or tear it out, or cut it out... I cannot even touch it. It is suffocating me, weighing me down as though my heart were locked in grey-blue ice. I can but hope that it will not be a hindrance when I am guiding the ship through the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Sea of Souls{/g}."

traits.locale_text: "Allerdings ... beunruhigt mich der Stein, den Ihr mir nach Feleks Anweisungen angelegt habt. Ich kann ihn nicht entfernen, was ich auch versuche. Er erstickt und belastet mich, als wäre mein Herz in graublauem Eis eingeschlossen. Ich kann nur hoffen, dass er mich nicht behindert, wenn ich das Schiff durch das {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Meer der Seelen{/g} steuere."

languages.text: « Cela dit... La {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaAmuletOn}pierre{/d} que vous m'avez implantée selon les instructions de Felek me perturbe. Je ne peux ni l'enlever, ni l'extraire, ni l'arracher... À vrai dire, je ne peux même pas la toucher. Elle m'étouffe. Elle me pèse, comme si mon cœur était prisonnier d'une gangue de glace gris-bleu. J'espère simplement qu'elle ne sera pas un obstacle lorsque je guiderai le navire à travers la {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Mer des Âmes{/g}. »
languages.original_text: "However... I am troubled by that {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaAmuletOn}stone{/d} you implanted inside me according to Felek's instructions. I cannot remove it, or tear it out, or cut it out... I cannot even touch it. It is suffocating me, weighing me down as though my heart were locked in grey-blue ice. I can but hope that it will not be a hindrance when I am guiding the ship through the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Sea of Souls{/g}."

traits.locale_text: « Cela dit... La pierre que vous m'avez apposée selon les instructions de Felek me perturbe. Je suis incapable de la retirer, quels que soient mes efforts. Elle m'étouffe. Elle me pèse, comme si mon cœur était prisonnier d'une gangue de glace gris-bleu. J'espère simplement qu'elle ne sera pas un obstacle lorsque je guiderai le navire à travers la {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Mer des Âmes{/g}. »

languages.text: 「ですが…あたくしは、陛下がフェレックに言われてこの体に埋め込んだ{d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaAmuletOn}石{/d}に悩まされているのです。取り除くことも、壊すことも、切り取ることもできません…触れることさえままならない。息苦しい。まるで心が、灰色がかった青い氷に閉じ込められているように重くのしかかるのです。{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}魂の海{/g}で船を導くときに、悪く働かないことを祈るばかりです」
languages.original_text: "However... I am troubled by that {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaAmuletOn}stone{/d} you implanted inside me according to Felek's instructions. I cannot remove it, or tear it out, or cut it out... I cannot even touch it. It is suffocating me, weighing me down as though my heart were locked in grey-blue ice. I can but hope that it will not be a hindrance when I am guiding the ship through the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Sea of Souls{/g}."

traits.locale_text: 「ですが…私は、あなたがフェレックに言われてこの体に埋め込んだ{d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaAmuletOn}石{/d}に悩まされています。取り除くことも、壊すことも、切り取ることもできません…触れることさえままならない。息苦しい。まるで心が、灰色がかった青い氷に閉じ込められているように重くのしかかります。{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}魂の海{/g}を船で進むときに、悪く働かないことを祈るばかりです」

「ですが…あたくしは、陛下がフェレックに言われてこの体に埋め込んだ{d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaAmuletOn}石{/d}に悩まされているのです。取り除くことも、壊すことも、切り取ることもできません…触れることさえままならない。息苦しい。まるで心が、灰色がかった青い氷に閉じ込められているように重くのしかかるのです。{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}魂の海{/g}で船を導くときに、悪く働かないことを祈るばかりです」

languages.text: «Sin embargo... me preocupa la {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaAmuletOn}piedra{/d} que me ha implantado siguiendo las instrucciones de Felek. No puedo quitármela aunque intente arrancármela o cortarla... no puedo ni tocarla. Me ahoga, me pesa como si mi corazón estuviera encerrado en un bloque de hielo gris. Solo espero que no interfiera cuando guío la nave por el {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Mar de Almas{/g}».
languages.original_text: "However... I am troubled by that {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaAmuletOn}stone{/d} you implanted inside me according to Felek's instructions. I cannot remove it, or tear it out, or cut it out... I cannot even touch it. It is suffocating me, weighing me down as though my heart were locked in grey-blue ice. I can but hope that it will not be a hindrance when I am guiding the ship through the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Sea of Souls{/g}."

traits.locale_text: «Sin embargo... me preocupa la piedra que me ha colocado siguiendo las instrucciones de Felek. Da igual lo que haga, no puedo quitármela. Me ahoga, me pesa como si mi corazón estuviera encerrado en un bloque de hielo gros. Solo espero que no interfiera cuando guío la nave por el {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}mar de almas{/g}».

languages.text: "Lakin... Felek'in lafına aldanıp içime bir {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaAmuletOn}taş{/d} yerleştirmiş olmandan hoşnut değilim. Ne keserek ne de sökerek atabiliyorum. Ona dokunamıyorum bile. Beni boğuyor, yüreğim gri-mavi bir buzun içinde mahsur kalmış gibi beni dibe çekiyor. Dilerim gemiyi {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Ruhlar Denizi'nde{/g} yönlendirirken bir engel teşkil etmez."
languages.original_text: "However... I am troubled by that {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaAmuletOn}stone{/d} you implanted inside me according to Felek's instructions. I cannot remove it, or tear it out, or cut it out... I cannot even touch it. It is suffocating me, weighing me down as though my heart were locked in grey-blue ice. I can but hope that it will not be a hindrance when I am guiding the ship through the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Sea of Souls{/g}."

traits.locale_text: "Lakin... Felek'in lafına aldanıp içime bir taş yerleştirmiş olmandan hoşnut değilim. Ne keserek ne de sökerek atabiliyorum. Ona dokunamıyorum bile. Beni boğuyor, yüreğim gri-mavi bir buzun içinde mahsur kalmış gibi beni dibe çekiyor. Dilerim gemiyi {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Ruhlar Denizi{/g}'nde yönlendirirken bir engel teşkil etmez."
